body: Looks like a bug, thanks for reporting it

issue.title: RtGistITCase failing because user has not gists

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
I ran: 

mvn clean install -Dit.test=RtGistITCase -Dfailsafe.github.key=my-key -Dfailsafe.github.repo=hariso/some-repo-of-mine

I had not gists on my account, and I got the message below:

java.util.NoSuchElementException: no more elements in pagination, use #hasNext()
    at com.jcabi.github.RtPagination$Items.next(RtPagination.java:154)
    at com.jcabi.github.RtGistITCase.gist(RtGistITCase.java:67)
    at com.jcabi.github.RtGistITCase.readsAndWritesGists(RtGistITCase.java:50)

body: @hariso Please, close the issue. Thank you!

issue.title: Wrong request in RtGist.read() and RtGist.write()

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body: In RtGist.read() and RtGist.write() wrong request object is used. On lines 112 and 138 this.entry should be replaced by this.request. The bug can be reproduced by an integration test RtGistITCase.readsAndWritesGists().

body: @hariso Could you please close the issue?
I ran the Integration Test and couldn't repro the issue, so I'm closing it.
@longtimeago **30 mins** added to your account (payment number `DA2137277`), many thanks for your contribution!
